Name: Solacer - Lone Light in the Long Night
AttributesDescription:
Enemies take 15% more total DMG. Inflicting Negative Status on the enemies increases total DMG by 15% for 30s.

This Token can be used up to 2 times in Whimpering Wastes.
BgDescription: The night was far too long, so long that even the end of the endless dark was nowhere to be found. Holding tight to the final spark of light in her arms, in her haze, she mistook it for the breaking dawn.
ObtainedShowDescription: Enemies take 15% more total DMG. Inflicting Negative Status on the enemies increases total DMG by 15% for 30s.
